mapper.insert:
insert into SC0201 (SC0201_ID, PROJECT_NO, SUPER_P_NO, SUPER_P_LEVEL, SYS_NO, SUPER_P_CHECK, SUPER_P_EXP, SUPER_P_CONT, SUPER_P_SCORE, OP_UNIT, STATUS, SHOW_NO, IF_FILE, IF_PIC, IF_LINE, IF_DIST, SCORE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG ) values
(#{projectContent.sc0201Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.superPNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.superPLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.superPCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.superPExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.superPCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.superPScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectContent.opUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{projectContent.showNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.ifFile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{projectContent.ifPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{projectContent.ifLine,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{projectContent.ifDist,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{projectContent.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectContent.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectContent.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectContent.deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.SC020101_ID, t2.FILE_URL, t2.FILE_TIME, t2.FILE_NAME, t2.FILE_NUM, t3.SC020102_ID, t3.APP_URL, t3.PIC_NAME, t3.PIC_TIME, t3.PIC_NUM, t4.*, t5.*, t6.STATUS as PROJECT_STATUS, t6.SC02_ID, t6.PROJECT_NAME from SC0201 t1 left join SC020101 t2 on t2.FILE_SOURCE = t1.SC0201_ID and t2.STATUS = '1' and t2.DELETE_FLAG = '0' left join SC020102 t3 on t3.PIC_SOURCE = t1.SC0201_ID and t3.STATUS = '1' and t3.DELETE_FLAG = '0' left join SC020103 t4 on t4.LINE_SOURCE = t1.SC0201_ID and t4.STATUS = '1' and t4.DELETE_FLAG = '0' left join SC020104 t5 on t5.DIST_SOURCE = t1.SC0201_ID and t5.STATUS = '1' and t5.DELETE_FLAG = '0' left join SC02 t6 on t6.PROJECT_NO = t1.PROJECT_NO where t1.SC0201_ID = #{sc0201Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.DELETE_FLAG = '0' order by t2.FILE_NUM, t3.PIC_NUM, t4.LINE_NUM, t5.DIST_NO

select t3.*, convert(t3.totalScore / t3.totalSuperScore * 100, decimal(10,2)) as percent from (select t1.SUPER_P_CHECK, count(t2.SC0201_ID) as childNum, ifnull(sum(t2.SUPER_P_SCORE), 0) as totalSuperScore, ifnull(sum(t2.SCORE), 0) as totalScore from SC0201 t1 left join SC0201 t2 on t2.SUPER_P_NO regexp concat('^', t1.SUPER_P_NO) and t2.STATUS = '1' and t2.DELETE_FLAG = '0' and t2.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t2.SUPER_P_LEVEL != '1' where t1.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.STATUS = '1' and t1.DELETE_FLAG = '0' and t1.SUPER_P_LEVEL = '1' group by t1.SC0201_ID order by cast(REPLACE(t1.SYS_NO, '.', '') as SIGNED)) t3

select t1.SUPER_P_CHECK, YEAR(t3.FILE_TIME) as year, count(t3.FILE_SOURCE) as number from SC0201 t1,SC0201 t2, SC020101 t3 where t1.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.STATUS = '1' and t1.DELETE_FLAG = '0' and t1.SUPER_P_LEVEL = '1' and t2.SUPER_P_NO regexp concat('^', t1.SUPER_P_NO) and t2.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t2.STATUS = '1' and t2.DELETE_FLAG = '0' and t2.SUPER_P_LEVEL != '1' and t2.SC0201_ID = t3.FILE_SOURCE and t3.STATUS = '1' and t3.DELETE_FLAG = '0' group by t1.SC0201_ID, YEAR(t3.FILE_TIME) order by cast(REPLACE(t1.SYS_NO, '.', '') as SIGNED), YEAR(t3.FILE_TIME)
